message.body: Got a question for you: Is your moped manual transmission? I'm shopping for a motorcycle for my lady and thought maybe I could get her a moped to learn on. ...depending.
Hmmmm.. 1. No it's not manual, its auto? oR 2. There is no auto-trans?? Sorry. :/

Whoa whoa whoa! You mean 2 stroke as in you have to stroke it once and then you have to stroke it another time? Or do you mean 2 stroke as in when you ride it you auto matically have 2 strokes cause it's so badass? JK-thanks
